message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $110. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm only willing to pay $105 for the product right now. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $108. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
